question: What is the main purpose of the Process Feedback mini-course?
options: To get familiar with Process Feedback application
To learn CSS Grid and Flexbox
correctAnswer: To get familiar with Process Feedback application

question: In the report page of Process Feedback, when you want to view your detailed writing process, which option should you choose?
In the report page, what does copy-paste-events section does?
options: It shows how many times I copy-pasted during my writing journey
It displays the number of comments the instructor left on my final submission.
It shows how long I spent writing each paragraph of the assignment.
It tracks the number of grammar and spelling mistakes in my draft.
correctAnswer: It shows how many times I copy-pasted during my writing journey

question: None of the charts on the report page are interactive.
On the report page, in the text-added and text-removed bubble chart, what does the red bubble represent??
To share your writing report with someone, you can simply click the ‘Copy Report Link’ option in the sidebar, or copy the link directly from the URL.
